title: Pulsefire Ezreal Bug [GAMEPLAY]
body: Just played a ranked game and Ezreal was glitching all over the place. His legs were moving sparatically and his picture on the mini map and tab screen was a white box. In chat it didnt say (Ezreal) like it normally does but instead just (). The white box took up a large portion of the bot lane so it was impossible to see who was near him (enemies or allies). It started happening around 5 minutes and continued for the rest of the game. Looking at the mini map was difficult/impossible during team fights because we couldnt see who was next to him.

replies.body:
Hey there! 

Are you referring to live or PBE?

If so, PFE is currently disabled due to the issue you're describing. We'll investigate how this may have happened.

Thanks for the report!

This was live. In a ranked game a few minutes ago. 

I took a video on my phone but im having trouble uploading it.
No worries, I know the issue you're referring to!
are you ever gonna retexturize pulsefire ezreal
